title: 2025 Nissan Pathfinder's October Lease Deals Arrive Just in Time for the Holidays
description: In the era of SUVs trying to be fashion statements, the 2025 Nissan Pathfinder is the quiet kid in the corner who just gets things done. While rivals pile on oversized grilles and “adventure” trims designed for suburban curbs, the Pathfinder focuses on being genuinely usable for families, not ...
titleSummary: "Pathfinder Perks Kick Off: Exclusive Leases Debut in Time for Holiday Shoppers"
descriptionSummary: In a sea of SUVs prioritizing style over substance, the 2025 Nissan Pathfinder stands out as a practical workhorse. It ditches flash for function, offering genuine usability and thoughtful design for those who need it most – families.

title: Auction Subaru STI From Hell: Dealer Swaps In Blown “Built” Engine and Hopes Nobody Notices
description: There is a certain thrill in poking around salvage auctions. You go in dreaming of hidden gems. You come out either a hero or someone Googling the price of tetanus shots. The guys at the YouTube Channel, I Do Cars, inspected a car bought from auction that belongs to their buddy, Pete, who ...
titleSummary: "Auction Bombshell: Dealer's Sneaky Swap Exposed on Rare Subaru Performance Car"
descriptionSummary: Diving into salvage auctions is a thrilling adventure, where hope meets uncertainty. You scan for hidden treasures, but often end up learning about more than just cars - and possibly the importance of vaccination protocols.

title: China Is Coming for Japan’s Tiny Cars — Meet BYD’s New Electric Kei Car
description: While the Kei car segment is dominated by Japanese manufacturers like Honda, Suzuki, Daihatsu, and Nissan, Chinese brand BYD is taking the fight to them with the unveiling of an electric Kei car at the Japan Mobility Show. BYD have been selling passenger EVs in Japan since 2023, and the Racco is ...
titleSummary: China's BYD Set to Challenge Japan with Revolutionary Electric Mini Vehicles
descriptionSummary: Chinese automaker BYD is making a bold move into Japan's compact market, unveiling an all-electric Kei car at the Japan Mobility Show. The newcomer challenges traditional Japanese brands like Honda and Suzuki, which have long dominated this segment.

title: Mazda’s New Concept Promises to Clean the Air While You Drive
description: It seemed like a typo in the press release handed out to journalists ahead of the Mazda news conference at this week’s Japan Mobility Show. But then the claim was repeated when the Hiroshima-based automaker’s global President and CEO Masahiro Moro got up on stage. Among several intriguing new ...
titleSummary: Revolutionary Roadster Unveiled with Groundbreaking Technology for Cleaner, Greener Commutes Ahead
descriptionSummary: At the recent Japan Mobility Show, a seemingly minor discrepancy in a press release caught attention - a detail later echoed by Mazda's global leader, sparking curiosity about what the automaker had in store.

title: Longbow Speedster EV Humiliates Tesla’s Roadster By Just Existing
description: The future of electric sports cars wasn’t supposed to look like this. It was supposed to be sleek, silent, autonomous, and weighed down by enough battery to power a small village. Then the Longbow Speedster showed up like a glitch in the EV simulation and said: Actually, what if we went back to fun ...
titleSummary: "Rival Tesla's Electric Supercar with Unflappable Ease, This Obscure Competitor"
descriptionSummary: Electric sports cars were envisioned as futuristic, high-tech speedsters with endless capabilities and bulky batteries. But then came the Longbow Speedster, defying expectations by embracing a more playful, unapologetically fun approach to performance.

title: Seeing Subaru’s Performance Concept Up Close Proves the STI Spirit Isn’t Dead
description: At the 2025 Japan Mobility Show, Subaru has revealed its vision of the future – and it isn't a full-electric one. Under the theme "Driving the Subaru Difference," the brand unveiled two STI concepts: the battery-powered Performance-E STI and the combustion-powered Performance-B STI. Yes, ...
titleSummary: "Subaru's Unleashed Beast: A Revival of Speed and Passion in Latest STI Concept"
descriptionSummary: At this year's Japan Mobility Show, Subaru showcased its futuristic take on performance with not one, but two striking concept vehicles that embody its unique approach to driving excellence. The battery-powered Performance-E STI and the combustion-powered Performance-B STI stole the show.

title: Slate's EV Truck Won't Have Service Centers—Your Local Mechanic Will Fix It
description: Slate, the plucky American startup promising a pint-sized electric pickup for the people, has decided it’s far too clever to muck about with service centers. Why build shiny temples of EV repair when there’s already a nation full of grease-stained legends with socket wrenches and strong opinions ...
titleSummary: "Slate's Electric Rigs Take the DIY Route with Community Repairs"
descriptionSummary: Slate, an ambitious US electric vehicle maker, is opting out of traditional service center model. Instead, it's betting on partnering with experienced local garages to provide repairs and maintenance for its compact EV pickup trucks.

title: Jaguar’s Electric GT Just Got Delayed — and It’ll Cost You $130,000
description: Jaguar’s highly anticipated all-electric grand tourer, known internally as the Type 00, has been delayed until 2026, with pricing confirmed to start at $130,000. The car was originally scheduled for a late-2025 debut but has been pushed back following what the company describes as ...
titleSummary: Jaguar's Pricy EV Supercar Takes a Detour, Now Due to Arrive in 2024 at $130,000
descriptionSummary: Jaguar's highly anticipated all-electric grand tourer has hit a roadblock, pushing its release date from 2025 to 2026. Pricing will start at $130,000, and fans of the brand can expect an exciting, albeit delayed, driving experience.

title: Porsche's Electric 718 Cayman Pretends To Be A 911 On The Nürburgring
description: About five years ago, it looked like the entire industry was jumping headfirst into all-electric vehicles, including Porsche, which decided that its "entry-level" sports car, the 718, no longer needed a gas engine to sell. The automotive landscape has changed considerably since then, but Porsche is ...
titleSummary: "Electric Stealth: Porsche's 718 Cayman Blurs the Line with its Ring Record Bid"
descriptionSummary: The electric vehicle revolution gained momentum around five years ago, with many manufacturers, including Porsche, embracing all-electric powertrains. However, the automotive industry's trajectory has shifted significantly since that time, and Porsche's approach has evolved accordingly.

title: 2026 Honda Passport TrailSport HRC Concept is a Rugged Overlanding Tease
description: The 2026 Honda Passport has taken a welcome step up in rugged capability. It’s still a crossover, but now it’s one you can do some mild off-roading with more confidently, particularly in TrailSport guise. Building on this sturdier foundation, Honda Racing Corporation (HRC) in the United States has ...
titleSummary: "Rugged Road Warrior: Honda Unveils Aggressive Passport Concept for Off-Pavement Adventures"
descriptionSummary: The 2026 Honda Passport is a more adventurous take on the traditional crossover, boasting enhanced rugged capabilities that make it suitable for light off-roading. The TrailSport trim takes this to the next level, backed by the expertise of Honda Racing Corporation's US team.

title: The Mazda Miata Is America's Most Fun Car—And Its Least Driven
description: As any enthusiast will tell you, the most fun car to drive is the Mazda MX-5 Miata. The little roadster delivers the pure joy of driving without the complexity, weight, or price tag of most other drivers’ cars out there. As far as benchmarks go for what driving should feel like, buy a Miata. Except ...
titleSummary: "America's Favorite Roadster Lays Low, Leaving Enthusiasts Wondering What They're Missing"
descriptionSummary: For driving enthusiasts, few cars capture the essence of fun behind the wheel quite like the Mazda MX-5 Miata. Unencumbered by weight, complexity, and hefty price tags, this roadster embodies the pure thrill of driving at its most accessible.

title: 2020 Lamborghini Huracán Super Trofeo EVO For Sale With 84 Miles
description: A 2020 Lamborghini Huracán Super Trofeo EVO Collector 2019 has surfaced on Bring a Trailer, showing just 84 miles from new. This barely-used example of Lamborghini’s track-ready racer represents one of the lowest-mileage Super Trofeo EVOs ever offered for sale, bridging the line ...
titleSummary: "Lamborghini's Top-Flight Racer Hits the Market with Just 134 Kilometers Under Its Belt"
descriptionSummary: A rare 2020 Lamborghini Huracán Super Trofeo EVO Collector has been listed on Bring a Trailer, boasting an astonishing 84 miles from new. This ultra-low-mileage specimen showcases Lamborghini's track-capable performance at its finest.

title: Volkswagen’s Latest SUV Is Officially One of the Safest You Can Buy
description: Volkswagen of America has announced that the 2025 Volkswagen Tiguan has earned a 5-Star overall safety rating from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), the highest possible score under the agency’s New Car Assessment Program. The new Tiguan joins ...
titleSummary: New VW SUV Earns Top Safety Rating, Sets Benchmark for Industry Excellence
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's 2025 Tiguan has received the top honors in safety, earning a perfect 5-star overall rating from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration for its exemplary performance in protecting drivers and passengers on the road.

title: Lucid Teases Tesla Model Y Fighter With Level 4 Self-Driving
description: Earlier this year, Lucid announced plans for three new, more affordable midsize models to join the Air and Gravity family, and now the automaker has given us a taste of what to expect from the first of these, which will be a crossover. Known only as "Project Midsize," the Model Y fighter was teased ...
titleSummary: "Lucid Unveils Ambitious Challenger to Tesla's Crown, Featuring Advanced Autonomous Tech"
descriptionSummary: Lucid is expanding its lineup with three new midsize models, starting with a crossover that's rumored to take on Tesla's Model Y. Details are scarce, but the project has been dubbed "Midsize" – a sign of things to come.

title: Toyota Land Cruiser FJ Looks Bare and Rugged in the Metal
description: Toyota's decision to launch the Land Cruiser FJ earlier this month has split opinions. Some see it as a fitting nod to the Land Cruiser lineage, particularly the FJ Cruiser, while others regard it as a bad move for the automaker – dare say a dilution of the badge's legacy. I understand both sides, ...
titleSummary: "Rough-Hewn Beauty: Toyota's FJ Land Cruiser Revealed in Unadorned Glory"
descriptionSummary: The introduction of Toyota's Land Cruiser FJ has sparked debate among enthusiasts. While some praise its heritage roots, others worry that this new model undermines the iconic brand's rich history and legacy. I see merit in both perspectives.

title: GM Listened: CarPlay Stays (At Least) Until 2028
description: General Motors first announced it would phase out Apple CarPlay and Android Auto support from its electric vehicle lineup in 2023. The popular Chevy Equinox EV was one of the first casualties, with an Android Automotive OS infotainment system with Google built in instead. The move was unpopular, to ...
titleSummary: GM Backpedals: Apple CarPlay Integration to Remain in Vehicles Through 2028
descriptionSummary: General Motors made headlines last year when it announced plans to abandon Apple CarPlay and Android Auto support from its electric vehicles, starting with the 2023 Chevy Equinox EV, which now features a built-in Google-infused infotainment system based on Android Automotive OS.

title: 2026 Cadillac Celestiq Now Costs More Than Rolls-Royce Spectre
description: Cadillac is slowly recapturing its status as a luxury brand to be taken seriously, and it’s largely thanks to a strong lineup of high-end EVs. Models like the Lyriq and Optiq are successfully poaching customers from prestigious German marques, and what has also been a major image-booster for ...
titleSummary: "Cadillac's Flagship Luxury Car Now Commands a Price Tag to Rival Royalty"
descriptionSummary: Cadillac is reclaiming its position as a luxury leader with a robust portfolio of premium electric vehicles. Its latest offerings, such as the Lyriq and Optiq, are luring high-end buyers away from traditional European rivals, bolstering the brand's reputation in the process.

title: This Mini Is More Designer Bag Than Car
description: There are collaborations, and then there’s this one. Mini and Sir Paul Smith, two icons of British design, have teamed up again to prove that heritage doesn’t have to mean predictable. The result is the Mini Paul Smith Edition, a sharply tailored remix of Britain’s most charming compact, unveiled ...
titleSummary: "Mini Meets Luxury: The Car That's Redefining Automotive Chic"
descriptionSummary: British design legends Mini and Sir Paul Smith join forces once more, blending their iconic styles in a fresh fusion of heritage chic. The outcome is the stylishly reimagined Mini Paul Smith Edition, now unveiled for public delight.

title: 2027 Kia Telluride X-Pro Flexes Off-Road Muscles in New Teaser
description: After giving us a first look at the 2027 Telluride earlier this month, Kia has now released new images and an adrenaline-filled video of the upcoming crossover as we get closer to its official unveiling next month. The latest images and video depict the new Telluride in a newly designed camouflage ...
titleSummary: "Telluride Takes on Toughest Terrain with Unleashed Off-Road Beast Mode"
descriptionSummary: Kia is building anticipation for the 2027 Telluride's debut with a fresh wave of photos and a high-energy video. These latest visuals showcase the upcoming crossover, draped in bold new camo patterns, as we count down to its official reveal next month.

title: Mopar’s Ram 1500 and Dodge Charger SEMA Concepts Redefine Street Performance
description: Mopar, rarely one to disappoint at the annual SEMA Show, has just unveiled two high-performance concepts based on the Ram 1500 and Dodge Charger. Both designed to prioritize street performance, the first is the Dude Ram 1500 Concept and the second is the Moparized Dodge SixPack Charger Concept. ...
titleSummary: "Mopar Takes Performance to New Heights with Electrifying SEMA Show Reveals"
descriptionSummary: At this year's SEMA Show, Mopar has pulled out all the stops with a pair of blistering concepts: a high-performance Ram 1500 and a souped-up Dodge Charger, both built for one thing - dominating the streets in style.

title: Subaru’s Japan Mobility Show Reveal Proves Petrol Isn’t Dead, It’s Having a Party
description: Earlier this month, Subaru teased us with what could be the future of the brand. While some carmakers turn up to motor shows with slick shapes and polite smiles. Subaru, however, turned up to the Japan Mobility Show 2025 with a garage full of glorious lunacy.  There’s an electric sports car, a ...
titleSummary: "Petrol Revival: Subaru's Bold Move at Japan's Mobility Show Stuns Industry Insiders"
descriptionSummary: At the Japan Mobility Show 2025, Subaru unleashed its wild side, flaunting an eclectic array of concept cars that pushed the boundaries of innovation and style. The lineup was a true reflection of the brand's fearless approach to design.

title: Next-Gen Miata Engineers Are Checking In With Old-School Enthusiasts
description: Eight engineers and designers from Mazda’s Hiroshima headquarters, responsible for developing the next-generation MX-5 Miata, made a public appearance at MiataCon this past weekend at Lime Rock Park. The annual event draws Miata owners from across the country to celebrate the lightweight sports car ...
titleSummary: Mazda's New Breed of Innovators Connects with Timeless Roadster Traditionalists
descriptionSummary: A team of eight engineers and designers from Mazda's Hiroshima headquarters stepped into the spotlight at MiataCon, where they mingled with enthusiasts and unveiled their vision for the next-generation MX-5 Miata. The gathering brought together passionate drivers from far and wide to honor the iconic roadster.

title: Mazda’s New Logo Keeps Its Wings, But Loses Its Soul
description: Mazda’s latest logo lands somewhere between evolution and inevitability. The Japanese carmaker filed for the trademark last year, and now, after making an appearance at the Japan Mobility Show 2025, it's set in stone. It represents the brand’s so-called “bridge to the future” – a cleaner, flatter ...
titleSummary: Mazda Takes Flight with Revamped Emblem, but Sacrifices Iconic Character
descriptionSummary: Mazda has unveiled its new logo, marking a deliberate step forward for the Japanese automaker. Introduced last year and recently showcased at Japan Mobility Show 2025, it embodies a sleeker, modern identity as the company's bridge to a more sustainable automotive future.

title: Bentley’s Bold Move: First Electric Car and a Hidden Twist Set to Be Unveiled Soon
description: Bentley Motors has confirmed it will host a special live presentation on November 5, 2025, streaming directly from its Crewe headquarters. The event will outline fresh details about the brand’s first fully electric car and include what it calls a “surprise” announcement, a second, ...
titleSummary: Bentley's Big Bet on Electric Power: A Surprising New Model Looms Large
descriptionSummary: Mark your calendars for November 5, 2025, as Bentley Motors is set to unveil exciting news live from its Crewe headquarters. The highly anticipated broadcast will reveal key details about their debut fully electric vehicle and a mysterious new development.

title: Las Vegas Police Debut the World’s First Tesla Cybertruck Patrol Fleet
description: The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department (LVMPD) has officially unveiled the world’s first public-safety fleet built entirely from Tesla Cybertrucks, marking a new chapter in electric law enforcement. Ten Cybertrucks, modified by Unplugged Performance’s UP.FIT division, were ...
titleSummary: Las Vegas Streets Get High-Tech Makeover with Innovative New Patrol Vehicles Unveiled
descriptionSummary: The Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department has launched a groundbreaking public-safety fleet powered exclusively by Tesla's futuristic Cybertrucks, signaling a major shift towards electric law enforcement with its first ten specially modified vehicles.

title: Mercedes-Benz Is Making The Electric E-Class Elegant Again
description: It's no secret that Mercedes-Benz dropped the ball when styling its all-electric EQ-branded models, particularly the EQS and EQE. The jellybean look may have seemed futuristic and unique in the Mercedes range, but it alienated traditional buyers, and so for the replacement models, Stuttgart's ...
titleSummary: Mercedes-Benz Gives Luxury Sedan an Electrifying Makeover with Sophisticated Style
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has taken a different approach with their new electric offerings, deviating from the polarizing design language of its predecessors like the EQS and EQE. Traditionalists may be pleased by the more conservative styling of their replacements.

title: What’s Next for the Audi A8? Even Audi Doesn’t Seem to Know Yet
description: Surprise: the larger, expensive luxury sedan isn't selling well. But slow sales aren't the Audi A8's only problem. A vastly more competitive and electrified market, a missing next-generation platform, and Audi's own uncertain path have all contributed to a set of trying circumstances for the large ...
titleSummary: Audi's Flagship Stalls: The Uncertain Future of a Luxury Icon Left in Limbo
descriptionSummary: The Audi A8 is facing a perfect storm: a rapidly shifting market dominated by electric vehicles, a stalled new platform, and Audi's own strategic uncertainty are all taking a toll on sales of this once-luxurious stalwart.

title: VW's European Sedan Just Drove 1,759 Miles on One Tank of Fuel
description: Rally driver Miko Marczyk has officially set a Guinness World Record by driving a fourth-generation Skoda Superb diesel 2,831 kilometers (1,759 miles) on a single tank of fuel – roughly the distance between New York City and Denver. The journey, completed between March 5 and 7, 2025, took the ...
titleSummary: VW Sedan Sets New Standard with Impressive 1,759-Mile Fuel Efficiency Record.
descriptionSummary: Polish rally driver Miko Marczyk has achieved an impressive feat by driving over 2,800 kilometers in his Skoda Superb diesel, setting a Guinness World Record for fuel efficiency on a single tank of fuel.

title: Should You Buy EV, Hybrid, or Gas in 2025? Your ZIP Code Decides the Winner
description: New-car ownership got cheaper this year. The measure for this is TCO, or Total Cost of Ownershp. AAA’s 2025 Your Driving Costs pegs the average at $11,577 per year, down $719 from 2024. What you should buy in 2025—hybrid vs EV cost 2025—still comes down to miles, your ZIP’s energy prices, and ...
titleSummary: "Plug In for Savings: How Your Location Affects Electric Vehicle Costs"
descriptionSummary: Car ownership got more affordable this year, with a decline in total annual costs. According to AAA's driving costs report, the average expense dropped by $719 to $11,577 per year. Key factors still influence buying decisions for hybrids or electric vehicles.

title: BMW Recalls 1,000 Vehicles for Faulty Seatbelts That May Fail in a Crash
description: BMW of North America has announced a recall of 1,024 vehicles from the 2026 model year, including select 2 Series Gran Coupe, X1, X2, and Mini Countryman models, after identifying potentially damaged seatbelt retractors supplied by Autoliv ASP Inc. The recall was confirmed by ...
titleSummary: BMW Orders Recall of Nearly 1,000 Cars Over Worrying Defects in Safety Harnesses
descriptionSummary: BMW is issuing a voluntary recall of over 1,000 model year 2026 vehicles, including certain 2 Series Gran Coupe, X1, X2, and Mini Countryman models, due to faulty seatbelt restraints that may be compromised by an issue with their retractors.

title: Ford Recalls Another 175,000 Trucks And SUVs For Parts That Could Fly Off While Driving
description: Nobody wants to glance into their rearview mirror and see that part of their car is flying away, but that's exactly what may happen to nearly 175,000 Ford owners. A new recall issued by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration reveals that some Ford SUVs and trucks may have been delivered ...
titleSummary: "Ford Issues Massive Recall for Rogue Fasteners in Popular Models"
descriptionSummary: Ford has announced a major safety alert affecting nearly 175,000 vehicle owners after discovering that certain models of their SUVs and trucks are at risk of losing body panels due to faulty manufacturing.

title: Honda Unveils Two New EVs as It Accelerates Electric Ambitions
description: While many automakers have begun paring back and slowing down their EV programs, Honda is just getting going – as it made clear during a news conference at the Japan Mobility Show on Wednesday. The country’s third-largest automaker rolled out a pair of “concept” battery-electric vehicles that will, ...
titleSummary: "Honda Boosts Electrification Plans with Debut of Two Exciting New Models"
descriptionSummary: At a recent showcase in Japan, Honda demonstrated its ongoing commitment to electric vehicles by unveiling two cutting-edge, concept battery-electric cars, signaling the brand's intention to accelerate rather than slow down its EV efforts.

title: Kia’s New Electric Van Just Set a Guinness World Record for Range
description: South Korean car manufacturer Kia has made its way into the record books with its new all-electric van. The PV5 Cargo set an official Guinness World Record for the longest distance travelled by a light-duty electric van on a single charge while carrying a full payload. Covering an astonishing ...
titleSummary: "Kia's Long-Range EV Sets Sights on Guinness World Record for Distance"
descriptionSummary: Kia has earned a coveted spot in the record books with its pioneering all-electric van, the PV5 Cargo, successfully completing a remarkable journey that set a new Guinness World Record for longest distance traveled by an electric light-duty van under load on a single charge.

title: 2025 Ford Expedition Lease Deals for October Make it Much Easier Drive One Home
description: From the rugged Tremor to the luxe King Ranch, Ford’s biggest SUV is leaning hard into power, polish, and tech, with lease deals that put full-size muscle within reach. The 2025 Ford Expedition isn’t shy about what it is. It’s big, brash, and built to haul people, boats, and bragging rights. But ...
titleSummary: "Steer Clear of Dealer Hassles: October's Best Ford Expedition Leases Unveiled"
descriptionSummary: The 2025 Ford Expedition embodies unapologetic grandeur, pairing its imposing size with sleek sophistication and cutting-edge tech. With lease deals that make high-performance capability accessible, this full-size SUV makes a bold statement on the road and off.

title: Self-Driving Mercedes S-Class is a Threat BMW Can’t Ignore
description: The S-Class has always been a showcase for the best technologies available to Mercedes-Benz customers. Way back in 1978, the W116 model was the first production car with an electronic four-wheel multi-channel ABS system. Through the decades, the S-Class continued to innovate with technologies like ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes Auto Revolution Leaves BMW Scrambling to Stay in Gear"
descriptionSummary: The S-Class has long served as a platform for Mercedes-Benz to showcase its most advanced features and innovations. From pioneering anti-lock braking in 1978 to introducing cutting-edge safety systems over the years, it's remained a leader in automotive technology.

title: Volvo and Adam Scott Team Up on Docuseries About Family Cars
description: If there is anything uniquely American about cars that gearheads and non-gearheads share within their lives, it is the tradition of the family car. No matter what brand's badge is prominently displayed on the hood or grille, or whether it's a minivan, crossover SUV, or sedan, it is a sacred place ...
titleSummary: "Racing Against Time: Adam Scott Drives Home Family Memories with Volvo"
descriptionSummary: For many Americans, family life revolves around one trusted vehicle – a dependable companion that's as familiar as the people who call it home. It's a symbol of tradition and comfort, where memories are made behind every wheel.

title: BYD Working On Compact Pickup to Rival the Hyundai Santa Cruz
description: BYD is preparing to expand its lineup with a compact pickup truck, marking the Chinese manufacturer’s first foray into the entry-level pickup space. Going by a recent patent published by the European Union Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO), BYD is woking on a unibody design aimed at global ...
titleSummary: "BYD Preps a Pocket-Sized Pickup to Take on the Hyundai Santa Cruz Challenger"
descriptionSummary: BYD is poised to enter the affordable pickup market with its upcoming compact truck, as hinted by a recently filed patent in Europe. The vehicle will feature a lightweight, one-piece body construction designed for global appeal.

title: Mitsubishi Elevance Concept is a Kickass Plug-In Hybrid Off-Roader
description: Mitsubishi’s back, and it’s done playing nice. At the Japan Mobility Show, the brand unwrapped the SUV they've been teasing us about for the past month, the Elevance Concept, a plug-in hybrid SUV that looks ready to chew up gravel, cross a continent, and power your campsite while it’s at it. Where ...
titleSummary: "Electric Off-Road Revolution: Mitsubishi's Elevance Concept Brings High-Octane Performance to 4x4 Terrain"
descriptionSummary: Mitsubishi makes its bold return, ditching subtlety in favor of unbridled excitement. The Japan Mobility Show debuted the Elevance Concept, a plug-in hybrid SUV engineered for rugged adventures and capable of generating enough juice to power up a remote campsite.

title: Nissan's New Luxury Minivan Makes An Odyssey Look Basic
description: Since the Nissan Quest departed America’s shores after 2017, the Japanese company has not had a minivan competitor in this market. In Japan, however, minivans remain a big deal; they’re even positioned as luxury status symbols in that market. For this reason, Nissan has just revealed an all-new ...
titleSummary: "Setting a New Standard in Style: Nissan Unveils its Luxe Family Hauler"
descriptionSummary: Nissan's exit from the US minivan market in 2017 left a void it hasn't filled since. But in Japan, where minivans hold high-end appeal, Nissan has introduced an entirely new model to cater to its loyal following and status-conscious buyers.

title: Toyota Corolla Concept Completely Reimagines the Humble Sedan
description: The humble Corolla nameplate has found itself attached to a few not-so-humble concepts over the last few weeks. First, we got an early look at the all-new Corolla Concept ahead of its debut at the Japan Mobility Show, before the lifted Corolla Cross Hybrid Nasu Edition was unveiled. Both hinted at ...
titleSummary: "Rethinking the Icon: Toyota's Game-Changing Corolla Concept Redefines a Classic"
descriptionSummary: The Toyota Corolla has been making waves with some unconventional variants lately. A concept version broke cover before its Japanese debut, followed by a ruggedized Corolla Cross Hybrid that defied expectations in every way.
